name: slackin-extended
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens)

RECAPTCHA_INVISIBLE.description: Use invisible reCAPTCHA instead of reCAPTCHA v2

SLACKIN_COC.description: A URL to a Code of Conduct people must agree on before joining.

SLACK_PRIVACY.description: A URL to a privacy policy people must agree on before joining.

SLACKIN_CHANNELS.description: Comma-separated list of single guest channels to invite them to (leave blank for a normal, all-channel invite). In order to make this work, you have to have a paid account. You'll only be able to invite as many people as your number of paying members times 5.

SLACKIN_ACCENT.description: Accent color to use instead of a theme default
